markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">
[Magnetic Acceleration](/Spells.aspx?ID=943)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Metal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=505" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Target** 1 creature or object
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You magnetize a small metal object, such as a nail or coin, and launch it away from you at massive speed. Make a ranged spell attack roll; if the target is wearing metal armor or is made of metal, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll with _magnetic acceleration_. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 bludgeoning damage and 3d6 piercing damage, or double damage on a critical hit.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The bludgeoning and piercing damage each increase by 1d6.
name: Magnetic Acceleration

<summary>

</summary>
